oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of 1st Battalion Headquarters, 114th F. A., Argonne Forest
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of soldiers standing in front of well built dug out shelter in the side of a hill. The roof is of several layers of logs topped with heavy corregated iron. All of the soldiers are wearing helmets and have gas mask bags on their left hips. Written on the reverse "1st Battalion Hdqtrs / 114th F. A. / Argonne Forest / Oct 1918 / A, B and C." The photograph is associated wtih Homer Geiger, Btry. B, 114th Field Art., 30th Div.
